de.htwg_konstanz.ebus.framework.wholesaler.api.boa
Class CategoryBOA

java.lang.Object
  de.htwg_konstanz.ebus.framework.wholesaler.api.boa.CategoryBOA

public class CategoryBOA
extends java.lang.Object

The CategoryBOA provides common CRUD operations (Create Read Update Delete) for the category entity.

The business object BOCategory represents a category entity with it's common attributes like shortDescription, longDescription or parentCategory.

The following example code shows how to create and persist a new category entity using the CategoryBOA. 

 BOCategory category = new BOCategory();
 category.setShortDescription(TEST_CAT_SHORT_DESCR);
 category.setLongDescription(TEST_CAT_LONG_DESCR);
 CategoryBOA.getInstance().saveOrUpdate(category);
The following example code shows how to load an existing category entity, using the CategoryBOA. 
 BOCategory category = CategoryBOA.getInstance().getCategoryById(TEST_CAT_SHORT_DESCR);
The following example code shows how to load and update an existing category entity, using the CategoryBOA. 
 // load the category   
 BOCategory category = CategoryBOA.getInstance().getCategoryById(TEST_CAT_SHORT_DESCR);   
 if (category != null)
 {              
        // set different long description and update
        category.setLongDescription(TEST_CAT_UPDATED_LONG_DESCR);
        CategoryBOA.getInstance().saveOrUpdate(category);
 }
The following example code shows how to delete an existing category entity, using the CategoryBOA. 
 // load the category   
 BOCategory category = CategoryBOA.getInstance().getCategoryById(TEST_CAT_SHORT_DESCR);   
 if (category != null)
 {              
        // delete the category
        CategoryBOA.getInstance().delete(category);
 }

tdi

findAll

public java.util.List<BOCategory> findAll()
Returns all available categories. If no record could be found, the method will return an empty list. 
 
    List boCategoryList = CategoryBOA.getInstance().findAll()

Returns:
all available categories

findChildren

public java.util.List<BOCategory> findChildren(java.lang.String parentCategory)
Returns all child categories by a given parent. If no record could be found, the method will return an empty list 
 
    List boCategoryList = CategoryBOA.getInstance().findAll()

Parameters:
parentCategory - an existing category
Returns:
all child categories by a given parent

saveOrUpdate

public void saveOrUpdate(BOCategory category)
Save or Update a given BO. If the given BO does exist, it will be updated (overwritten) otherwise it will be created.

Parameters:
category - an category to save or update

delete

public void delete(BOCategory category)
